urls.title: Flight Status
urls.description: SpiceJet Airlines | Low Airfares On Convenient flights for India & International

data.text: @rajkumardel Raj, as checked, the flight is scheduled to depart at 2030 hrs. Passengers are requested to keep a check on their flight status via https://t.co/VkU7yLB2ny.

@VikashK34831388 Vikash, as checked, a full refund has been processed to the agency ID dated 05th Nov'22. Please contact the agency for claims. You may write at custrelations@spicejet.com for an email confirmation.
@gaurav2811 We've received your DM, shall follow up there.

@gaurav2811 Hi Gaurav, kindly DM us your PNR so we may check the details.

https://t.co/Qi2laHz2Nw

@sudhajhunjhunwa Sudha, please note, the boarding pass shall be sent to the registered email ID soon. Further, check-in counters will open 3 hrs prior to departure. You may ask the passenger to report at the counter as well for boarding pass issuance.
@theabhibhushan Hi Abhishek, as checked, the booking is done under a special fare wherein the names are not updated yet. Kindly contact the source of booking for any assistance in this regard.

@faceismybook Hi Monty, kindly note that name changes on a confirmed booking are not permitted. However, please DM us your PNR so we may review your request.

https://t.co/Qi2laHz2Nw
@jaiswaranita We've updated our team to check and get back to you on priority.
@VnsRohitkumar Rohit, we've updated our team to check and get back to you on priority.

data.text:
Did you hear about it? Your favourite in-flight magazine – Spice Route – is now back, on-board and online. You can download it from https://t.co/2tQApwSDsA.

urls.title: Terms of Carriage for Domestic and International | Spicejet Airlines
urls.description: The carriage of a passenger on SpiceJet Airlines is subject to SpiceJet regulations relating to conditions of Non-International Carriage framed in accordance with The Carriage by Air Act, 1972 and Notification regarding application of the Carriage

data.text: @shraysthaj03 Hi Shraysthaj, you can carry the CPU in check-in baggage. Kindly refer to point no. 17 on link https://t.co/wjqSnzAhEs for baggage dimensions and allowance.

@KimothyAlbaani Kimothy, we try our best to accommodate as many passengers as we can but a passenger is denied only when it is beyond the control of the airline to accept the passenger once the counter is closed.

@KimothyAlbaani Kimothy, please note, failure to check-in for a SpiceJet flight at least 60 minutes prior to the scheduled departure time results in the fare being forfeited as the ticket is marked as a No-Show. As per our records, the passenger reported after the counter closure at 1945Hrs.
@SureshGhanchi12 Hi Suresh, we're rapidly expanding our network. We shall definitely look into the potential the option holds. Stay tuned with us for updates.
@KimothyAlbaani Hi Kimothy, as checked as per our system passenger has already checked in. Further, we request passenger to get in connect with available staff at the airport for further assistance.
@MaithiliUpadhy3 Hi Maithili, kindly DM us your PNR so we may check the details. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E
@iayush_garg Hi Ayush, kindly DM us your PNR or case number so we may check the details. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E
@bhardwaj_sona Hi Sonali, kindly DM us your PNR so we may check the details. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E

data.text:
Always reaching for the stars.  
Every journey is backed by the best engineers. 

Welcome aboard the red, hot, spicy experience.

#FlySpiceJet #SpiceJet #spice #spicy #spicy🌶 #MySpicyLife #addspicetoyourlife #engineer #engineering #Aviation #Aviationlovers #Travel #travellove https://t.co/z1sO4W42Kj

data.text:
@NareshC52799598 Awesome, that's what we like to hear, Naresh. We strive to provide excellent customer service and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. Kindly DM us your PNR and advise the department so we may share your words with our team.
https://t.co/UMdB9lKlTP
@AgnivaDeb2402 Hi Agniva, we will certainly share your suggestion with our team for further consideration. Please stay tuned with us for updates.

@manangupt Hi Manan, please share the screenshot of your booking along with the transaction details via DM, we shall check. 

https://t.co/UMdB9lKlTP

@SureshK41803007 Hi Suresh, please help us with your PNR via DM, we shall look into it. 

https://t.co/UMdB9lKlTP

@ChhadwaZil Hi Zil, full refund for your booking has already been processed towards the same agency ID from which the booking was done dated 21st Oct'22. Please get in touch with them for refund claims, they shall refund as per their own terms of the contract.

data.text: @subamxetri Hi Subam, as of now, the flight is operating as per the schedule. You may keep a regular check on the flight status via our website https://t.co/VkU7yLjZly.

@orkachans Hi Chandan, kindly note that SpiceJet follows a dynamic pricing structure whereby the fares vary as per the seat availability per flight. We only have a certain number of seats available for a specific price, and once those are purchased, the next available fare is released

data.text: @Varun02941483 Varun, you may select a preferable meal through the "Manage Booking" option on https://t.co/iQhxtfDb6b. Please note, charges shall be applicable.

@thathumblepost Hi, please note that dry sweets/food items are allowed to be carried in hand baggage. Further, passengers traveling under the same PNR can club their bags. Please note, that each bag must not exceed 32 kg as per airport baggage restrictions.

data.text: @parthnarielwala Parth, as checked, your flight is affected due to operational reasons. Please get in touch with our 24/7 Customer Care Helpline Number on +91 (0)124 4983410 +91 (0)124 7101600 for assistance. Or, you may refer to https://t.co/Qu3bOTPUU7 for an alternate flight or a full refund.
